Summary: UFO sighted descending and ascendig over NYS thruway
divs: Sighting Details Traveling west on highway 87 N.Y.S.Thruway the object shaped like a half of your disc above no color no sound. It dove down from the clouds we my daughter and I thought it was going to crash into the ground,then it made a 90 degree turn and I mean 90 degree to the right then 90 degree straight up and gone. Entire event lasted maybe 15 seconds We lost sight when it did the 90 degree straight up I guess into the clouds it was very dark. During the sighting there was no reaction or action it was all two fast. I read now on utube many other people had the same sighting I just feel it was ment for me to see differently. I am 69 years old and have wanted this all my life.I know crazy right,but there it was.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around November 22nd 2012
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
